template: UPDATE airport SET elevation_ft = {airports_elevation_ft} WHERE ident = {airports_ident}
description: An update statement allowing SQL injection through the ident parameter.

template: UPDATE airport SET municipality = {airports_municipality} WHERE iso_country = {airports_iso_country}
description: An update statement vulnerable to SQL injection through the municipality string field.

template: UPDATE airport SET wikipedia_link = {airports_wikipedia_link} WHERE type = {airports_type}
description: An update statement with SQL injection vulnerability in the type field from its where clause.

template: UPDATE airport SET gps_code = {airports_gps_code} WHERE continent = {airports_continent} AND iso_region = {airports_iso_region}
description: An update statement allowing SQL injection through the gps_code parameter.
